original_text: In the thirty-ninth year of his reign Asa was diseased in his feet, and his disease became severe. Yet even in his disease he did not seek the Lord, but sought help from physicians.
korean_text: 아사가 왕이 된 지 삼십구 년에 그의 발이 병들어 매우 위독했으나 병이 있을 때에 그가 여호와께 구하지 아니하고 의원들에게 구하였더라

sentences.original_text: In the thirty-ninth year of his reign Asa was diseased in his feet
Yet even in his disease he did not seek the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 병 중에도 주를 구하지 않았습니다.
